The system must be available for use between 7:00AM and 11:59PM all days of the year.': Reliability
'The product must be able to interface with various database management systems. The product shall communicate successfully with the database management system on 100% of all transactions.': Compatibility
'System will allow customers to pay for a streaming movie with a pre-paid card.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall have an intuitive user interface.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall display the grids within a circle as a view from a periscope.': Usability
'The product shall be easy to use by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. 95% of Adjusters and Collision Estimators shall find the product easy to use.': Usability
'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Compatibility
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility
'The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property': Functional Suitability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Reliability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Information Database. The Cardmember Information Database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember. All cardmember detail information must be obtained from the Cardmember Information Database.': Compatibility

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Users should only have to navigate through a maximum of 4 pages to create an account with the website.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.': Reliability
'The system shall display the local and exercise time in separate clocks': Functional Suitability
'The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.': Compatibility
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only users with the appropriate access level are allowed to initiate dispute requests.': Security
'The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.': Usability
'Product installations and upgrades shall be handled by the middleware technology team within established launch time frames.': Compatibility
'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Compatibility
'The System shall allow generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents on demand.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall increase productivity of Collision Estimators. 80% of the Collision Estimators shall agree their productivity has increase within 1 month of using the product.': Usability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “pay as you go” user in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall notify customers of changes to its information policy.': Security
'The product shall record meeting entries.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional Suitability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall be able to cancel a clinical lab section only if there are no students registered for that clinical lab section.': Functional Suitability
'Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.': Security
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional Suitability
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'The product shall be easy for a realtor to learn.': Usability
'The product will require collaboration with a database management system (DBMS). The DBMS may be located on the same machine as the product or on a separate machine residing on the same computer network.': Compatibility
'100% of saved user preferences shall be restored when system comes back online.': Reliability
'The system interface will use CCR nomenclature. The system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing WCS system and reports': Usability
'System shall let Izogn Manager access sales and usage statistics in under 2 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system will provide a 24 hour 800 toll free number for support to its customers.': Reliability
'The product shall ensure that the database’s data corresponds to the data entered by the user. Each conference room reservation in the system will contain the same information as was entered by the user.': Security
'The product shall provide Multi-threading and Load Balancing.The product shall provide multi-threading technology as well as load balancing to overcome data load spikes and traffic.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall produce search results in an acceptable time': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be platform independent.The product shall enable access to any type of development environment and platform.': Compatibility
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Usability
'The system shall be intuitive and self explanatory.': Usability
'A staff member shall have the ability to manage the progress of a part time student which includes modifying their sequence of classes and timeline of classes.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only authorized users are allowed to logon to the application.': Security
'The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.': Functional Suitability
'Vendor will submit a credit validation record to be applied to the enterprise billing system.': Functional Suitability
'When both players have positioned their 5 ships on their defensive grids the product shall define the status of each player for the first turn.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes to a sequence of classes': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record different meeting types.': Functional Suitability
'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.': Usability
'The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.': Functional Suitability
'The message board shall contain the 5 most recently posted messages on the league page. The messages will contain up to the first 150 characters of the message.': Usability
'The Disputes System shall provide view access capability for authorized users of the application.': Functional Suitability
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the defensive player to offensive': Functional Suitability
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The product will notify employees of meeting invitations.': Functional Suitability
'An anonymous survey will show that 70% of customers are comfortable purchasing streaming movies after 2 weeks using the website.': Usability
'A Program of Study shall consist of a program name and listing of required classes (both clinical and non-clinical) that must be completed.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual cohorts which will include the students enlisted the Program of study sequence of classes cohort progress through the program and timeline of completion.': Functional Suitability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall maintain a list of players.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to send meeting notifications via different kinds of end-user specified methods.': Functional Suitability
'The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.': Functional Suitability
'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'The estimator shall search for available recycled parts using damaged vehicle parts information.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Usability
'All authorized users once authenticated must be able to logon to the Disputes System': Security
'Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.': Security
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional Suitability
'Only registered realtors shall be able to access the system.': Security
'The system shall provide a history report of changes made to the Activity or Event data': Functional Suitability
'Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.': Reliability
'The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.': Security
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the number of available recycled parts from the original search results.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Usability

'The product shall have an intuitive user interface.': Functional Suitability

'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Information Database. The Cardmember Information Database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember. All cardmember detail information must be obtained from the Cardmember Information Database.': Compatibility

'The product shall ensure that the database’s data corresponds to the data entered by the user. Each conference room reservation in the system will contain the same information as was entered by the user.': Security
'The product shall provide Multi-threading and Load Balancing.The product shall provide multi-threading technology as well as load balancing to overcome data load spikes and traffic.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall produce search results in an acceptable time': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be platform independent.The product shall enable access to any type of development environment and platform.': Compatibility
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Usability
'The system shall be intuitive and self explanatory.': Usability
'A staff member shall have the ability to manage the progress of a part time student which includes modifying their sequence of classes and timeline of classes.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only authorized users are allowed to logon to the application.': Security
'The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.': Functional Suitability
'Vendor will submit a credit validation record to be applied to the enterprise billing system.': Functional Suitability
'When both players have positioned their 5 ships on their defensive grids the product shall define the status of each player for the first turn.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes to a sequence of classes': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record different meeting types.': Functional Suitability
'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.': Usability
'The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.': Functional Suitability
'The message board shall contain the 5 most recently posted messages on the league page. The messages will contain up to the first 150 characters of the message.': Usability
'The Disputes System shall provide view access capability for authorized users of the application.': Functional Suitability
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the defensive player to offensive': Functional Suitability
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The product will notify employees of meeting invitations.': Functional Suitability
'An anonymous survey will show that 70% of customers are comfortable purchasing streaming movies after 2 weeks using the website.': Usability
'A Program of Study shall consist of a program name and listing of required classes (both clinical and non-clinical) that must be completed.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual cohorts which will include the students enlisted the Program of study sequence of classes cohort progress through the program and timeline of completion.': Functional Suitability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall maintain a list of players.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to send meeting notifications via different kinds of end-user specified methods.': Functional Suitability
'The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.': Functional Suitability
'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'The estimator shall search for available recycled parts using damaged vehicle parts information.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Usability
'All authorized users once authenticated must be able to logon to the Disputes System': Security
'Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.': Security
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional Suitability
'Only registered realtors shall be able to access the system.': Security
'The system shall provide a history report of changes made to the Activity or Event data': Functional Suitability
'Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.': Reliability
'The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.': Security
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the number of available recycled parts from the original search results.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Usability
The system must be available for use between 7:00AM and 11:59PM all days of the year.': Reliability
'The product must be able to interface with various database management systems. The product shall communicate successfully with the database management system on 100% of all transactions.': Compatibility
'System will allow customers to pay for a streaming movie with a pre-paid card.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall have an intuitive user interface.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall display the grids within a circle as a view from a periscope.': Usability
'The product shall be easy to use by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. 95% of Adjusters and Collision Estimators shall find the product easy to use.': Usability
'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Compatibility
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility
'The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property': Functional Suitability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Reliability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Information Database. The Cardmember Information Database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember. All cardmember detail information must be obtained from the Cardmember Information Database.': Compatibility

Now, classify the following given requirement: The product shall ensure that only supervisors can enter a caller’s schedule.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.': Reliability
'The system shall display the local and exercise time in separate clocks': Functional Suitability
'The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.': Compatibility
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only users with the appropriate access level are allowed to initiate dispute requests.': Security
'The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.': Usability
'Product installations and upgrades shall be handled by the middleware technology team within established launch time frames.': Compatibility
'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Compatibility
'The System shall allow generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents on demand.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall increase productivity of Collision Estimators. 80% of the Collision Estimators shall agree their productivity has increase within 1 month of using the product.': Usability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “pay as you go” user in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall notify customers of changes to its information policy.': Security
'The product shall record meeting entries.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional Suitability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall be able to cancel a clinical lab section only if there are no students registered for that clinical lab section.': Functional Suitability
'Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.': Security
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional Suitability
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'The product shall be easy for a realtor to learn.': Usability
'The product will require collaboration with a database management system (DBMS). The DBMS may be located on the same machine as the product or on a separate machine residing on the same computer network.': Compatibility
'100% of saved user preferences shall be restored when system comes back online.': Reliability

'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the number of available recycled parts from the original search results.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Usability
The system must be available for use between 7:00AM and 11:59PM all days of the year.': Reliability
'The product must be able to interface with various database management systems. The product shall communicate successfully with the database management system on 100% of all transactions.': Compatibility
'System will allow customers to pay for a streaming movie with a pre-paid card.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall have an intuitive user interface.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall display the grids within a circle as a view from a periscope.': Usability
'The product shall be easy to use by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. 95% of Adjusters and Collision Estimators shall find the product easy to use.': Usability
'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Compatibility
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility
'The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property': Functional Suitability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Reliability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Information Database. The Cardmember Information Database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember. All cardmember detail information must be obtained from the Cardmember Information Database.': Compatibility

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall be easy to use. 90% of users will be able to successfully reserve a conference room within 5 minutes of product use.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.': Reliability
'The system shall display the local and exercise time in separate clocks': Functional Suitability
'The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.': Compatibility
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only users with the appropriate access level are allowed to initiate dispute requests.': Security
'The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.': Usability
'Product installations and upgrades shall be handled by the middleware technology team within established launch time frames.': Compatibility
'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Compatibility
'The System shall allow generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents on demand.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall increase productivity of Collision Estimators. 80% of the Collision Estimators shall agree their productivity has increase within 1 month of using the product.': Usability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “pay as you go” user in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall notify customers of changes to its information policy.': Security
'The product shall record meeting entries.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional Suitability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall be able to cancel a clinical lab section only if there are no students registered for that clinical lab section.': Functional Suitability
'Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.': Security
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional Suitability
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'The product shall be easy for a realtor to learn.': Usability
'The product will require collaboration with a database management system (DBMS). The DBMS may be located on the same machine as the product or on a separate machine residing on the same computer network.': Compatibility
'100% of saved user preferences shall be restored when system comes back online.': Reliability
'The system interface will use CCR nomenclature. The system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing WCS system and reports': Usability
'System shall let Izogn Manager access sales and usage statistics in under 2 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system will provide a 24 hour 800 toll free number for support to its customers.': Reliability
'The product shall ensure that the database’s data corresponds to the data entered by the user. Each conference room reservation in the system will contain the same information as was entered by the user.': Security
'The product shall provide Multi-threading and Load Balancing.The product shall provide multi-threading technology as well as load balancing to overcome data load spikes and traffic.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall produce search results in an acceptable time': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be platform independent.The product shall enable access to any type of development environment and platform.': Compatibility
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Usability
'The system shall be intuitive and self explanatory.': Usability
'A staff member shall have the ability to manage the progress of a part time student which includes modifying their sequence of classes and timeline of classes.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only authorized users are allowed to logon to the application.': Security
'The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.': Functional Suitability
'Vendor will submit a credit validation record to be applied to the enterprise billing system.': Functional Suitability
'When both players have positioned their 5 ships on their defensive grids the product shall define the status of each player for the first turn.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes to a sequence of classes': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record different meeting types.': Functional Suitability
'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.': Usability
'The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.': Functional Suitability
'The message board shall contain the 5 most recently posted messages on the league page. The messages will contain up to the first 150 characters of the message.': Usability
'The Disputes System shall provide view access capability for authorized users of the application.': Functional Suitability
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the defensive player to offensive': Functional Suitability
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The product will notify employees of meeting invitations.': Functional Suitability
'An anonymous survey will show that 70% of customers are comfortable purchasing streaming movies after 2 weeks using the website.': Usability
'A Program of Study shall consist of a program name and listing of required classes (both clinical and non-clinical) that must be completed.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual cohorts which will include the students enlisted the Program of study sequence of classes cohort progress through the program and timeline of completion.': Functional Suitability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall maintain a list of players.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to send meeting notifications via different kinds of end-user specified methods.': Functional Suitability
'The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.': Functional Suitability
'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'The estimator shall search for available recycled parts using damaged vehicle parts information.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Usability
'All authorized users once authenticated must be able to logon to the Disputes System': Security
'Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.': Security
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional Suitability
'Only registered realtors shall be able to access the system.': Security
'The system shall provide a history report of changes made to the Activity or Event data': Functional Suitability
'Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.': Reliability
'The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.': Security
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the number of available recycled parts from the original search results.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Usability

'The product must be able to interface with various database management systems. The product shall communicate successfully with the database management system on 100% of all transactions.': Compatibility
'System will allow customers to pay for a streaming movie with a pre-paid card.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall have an intuitive user interface.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall display the grids within a circle as a view from a periscope.': Usability
'The product shall be easy to use by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. 95% of Adjusters and Collision Estimators shall find the product easy to use.': Usability
'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Compatibility
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility
'The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property': Functional Suitability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Reliability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Information Database. The Cardmember Information Database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember. All cardmember detail information must be obtained from the Cardmember Information Database.': Compatibility

'System shall let Izogn Manager access sales and usage statistics in under 2 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system will provide a 24 hour 800 toll free number for support to its customers.': Reliability
'The product shall ensure that the database’s data corresponds to the data entered by the user. Each conference room reservation in the system will contain the same information as was entered by the user.': Security
'The product shall provide Multi-threading and Load Balancing.The product shall provide multi-threading technology as well as load balancing to overcome data load spikes and traffic.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall produce search results in an acceptable time': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be platform independent.The product shall enable access to any type of development environment and platform.': Compatibility
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Usability
'The system shall be intuitive and self explanatory.': Usability
'A staff member shall have the ability to manage the progress of a part time student which includes modifying their sequence of classes and timeline of classes.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only authorized users are allowed to logon to the application.': Security
'The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.': Functional Suitability
'Vendor will submit a credit validation record to be applied to the enterprise billing system.': Functional Suitability
'When both players have positioned their 5 ships on their defensive grids the product shall define the status of each player for the first turn.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes to a sequence of classes': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record different meeting types.': Functional Suitability
'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.': Usability
'The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.': Functional Suitability
'The message board shall contain the 5 most recently posted messages on the league page. The messages will contain up to the first 150 characters of the message.': Usability
'The Disputes System shall provide view access capability for authorized users of the application.': Functional Suitability
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the defensive player to offensive': Functional Suitability
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The product will notify employees of meeting invitations.': Functional Suitability
'An anonymous survey will show that 70% of customers are comfortable purchasing streaming movies after 2 weeks using the website.': Usability
'A Program of Study shall consist of a program name and listing of required classes (both clinical and non-clinical) that must be completed.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual cohorts which will include the students enlisted the Program of study sequence of classes cohort progress through the program and timeline of completion.': Functional Suitability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall maintain a list of players.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to send meeting notifications via different kinds of end-user specified methods.': Functional Suitability
'The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.': Functional Suitability
'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'The estimator shall search for available recycled parts using damaged vehicle parts information.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Usability
'All authorized users once authenticated must be able to logon to the Disputes System': Security
'Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.': Security
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional Suitability
'Only registered realtors shall be able to access the system.': Security
'The system shall provide a history report of changes made to the Activity or Event data': Functional Suitability
'Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.': Reliability
'The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.': Security
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the number of available recycled parts from the original search results.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Usability
The system must be available for use between 7:00AM and 11:59PM all days of the year.': Reliability
'The product must be able to interface with various database management systems. The product shall communicate successfully with the database management system on 100% of all transactions.': Compatibility
'System will allow customers to pay for a streaming movie with a pre-paid card.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall have an intuitive user interface.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall display the grids within a circle as a view from a periscope.': Usability
'The product shall be easy to use by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. 95% of Adjusters and Collision Estimators shall find the product easy to use.': Usability
'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Compatibility
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility
'The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property': Functional Suitability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Reliability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Information Database. The Cardmember Information Database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember. All cardmember detail information must be obtained from the Cardmember Information Database.': Compatibility

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall have a consistent color scheme and fonts.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.': Reliability
'The system shall display the local and exercise time in separate clocks': Functional Suitability
'The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.': Compatibility
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only users with the appropriate access level are allowed to initiate dispute requests.': Security
'The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.': Usability
'Product installations and upgrades shall be handled by the middleware technology team within established launch time frames.': Compatibility
'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Compatibility
'The System shall allow generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents on demand.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall increase productivity of Collision Estimators. 80% of the Collision Estimators shall agree their productivity has increase within 1 month of using the product.': Usability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “pay as you go” user in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall notify customers of changes to its information policy.': Security
'The product shall record meeting entries.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional Suitability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall be able to cancel a clinical lab section only if there are no students registered for that clinical lab section.': Functional Suitability
'Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.': Security
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional Suitability

'Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.': Reliability
'The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.': Security
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the number of available recycled parts from the original search results.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Usability
The system must be available for use between 7:00AM and 11:59PM all days of the year.': Reliability
'The product must be able to interface with various database management systems. The product shall communicate successfully with the database management system on 100% of all transactions.': Compatibility
'System will allow customers to pay for a streaming movie with a pre-paid card.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall have an intuitive user interface.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall display the grids within a circle as a view from a periscope.': Usability
'The product shall be easy to use by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. 95% of Adjusters and Collision Estimators shall find the product easy to use.': Usability
'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Compatibility
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility
'The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property': Functional Suitability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Reliability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Information Database. The Cardmember Information Database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember. All cardmember detail information must be obtained from the Cardmember Information Database.': Compatibility

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall display the Events in a graph by time.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.': Reliability
'The system shall display the local and exercise time in separate clocks': Functional Suitability
'The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.': Compatibility
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only users with the appropriate access level are allowed to initiate dispute requests.': Security
'The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.': Usability
'Product installations and upgrades shall be handled by the middleware technology team within established launch time frames.': Compatibility
'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Compatibility
'The System shall allow generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents on demand.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall increase productivity of Collision Estimators. 80% of the Collision Estimators shall agree their productivity has increase within 1 month of using the product.': Usability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “pay as you go” user in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall notify customers of changes to its information policy.': Security
'The product shall record meeting entries.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional Suitability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall be able to cancel a clinical lab section only if there are no students registered for that clinical lab section.': Functional Suitability
'Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.': Security
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional Suitability
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'The product shall be easy for a realtor to learn.': Usability
'The product will require collaboration with a database management system (DBMS). The DBMS may be located on the same machine as the product or on a separate machine residing on the same computer network.': Compatibility
'100% of saved user preferences shall be restored when system comes back online.': Reliability
'The system interface will use CCR nomenclature. The system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing WCS system and reports': Usability
'System shall let Izogn Manager access sales and usage statistics in under 2 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system will provide a 24 hour 800 toll free number for support to its customers.': Reliability
'The product shall ensure that the database’s data corresponds to the data entered by the user. Each conference room reservation in the system will contain the same information as was entered by the user.': Security
'The product shall provide Multi-threading and Load Balancing.The product shall provide multi-threading technology as well as load balancing to overcome data load spikes and traffic.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall produce search results in an acceptable time': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be platform independent.The product shall enable access to any type of development environment and platform.': Compatibility
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Usability
'The system shall be intuitive and self explanatory.': Usability
'A staff member shall have the ability to manage the progress of a part time student which includes modifying their sequence of classes and timeline of classes.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only authorized users are allowed to logon to the application.': Security
'The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.': Functional Suitability
'Vendor will submit a credit validation record to be applied to the enterprise billing system.': Functional Suitability
'When both players have positioned their 5 ships on their defensive grids the product shall define the status of each player for the first turn.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes to a sequence of classes': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record different meeting types.': Functional Suitability
'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.': Usability
'The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.': Functional Suitability
'The message board shall contain the 5 most recently posted messages on the league page. The messages will contain up to the first 150 characters of the message.': Usability
'The Disputes System shall provide view access capability for authorized users of the application.': Functional Suitability
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the defensive player to offensive': Functional Suitability
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The product will notify employees of meeting invitations.': Functional Suitability
'An anonymous survey will show that 70% of customers are comfortable purchasing streaming movies after 2 weeks using the website.': Usability
'A Program of Study shall consist of a program name and listing of required classes (both clinical and non-clinical) that must be completed.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual cohorts which will include the students enlisted the Program of study sequence of classes cohort progress through the program and timeline of completion.': Functional Suitability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall maintain a list of players.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to send meeting notifications via different kinds of end-user specified methods.': Functional Suitability
'The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.': Functional Suitability
'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'The estimator shall search for available recycled parts using damaged vehicle parts information.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Usability
'All authorized users once authenticated must be able to logon to the Disputes System': Security
'Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.': Security
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional Suitability
'Only registered realtors shall be able to access the system.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: The system shall be easy to use by callers and supervisors. Callers and supervisors must be able to accomplish any system task within 2 minutes.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'When a game is ended the product shall allow each player to identify himself or herself as an available player in the list of players.'

'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'The product shall be easy for a realtor to learn.': Usability
'The product will require collaboration with a database management system (DBMS). The DBMS may be located on the same machine as the product or on a separate machine residing on the same computer network.': Compatibility
'100% of saved user preferences shall be restored when system comes back online.': Reliability
'The system interface will use CCR nomenclature. The system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing WCS system and reports': Usability
'System shall let Izogn Manager access sales and usage statistics in under 2 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system will provide a 24 hour 800 toll free number for support to its customers.': Reliability
'The product shall ensure that the database’s data corresponds to the data entered by the user. Each conference room reservation in the system will contain the same information as was entered by the user.': Security
'The product shall provide Multi-threading and Load Balancing.The product shall provide multi-threading technology as well as load balancing to overcome data load spikes and traffic.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall produce search results in an acceptable time': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be platform independent.The product shall enable access to any type of development environment and platform.': Compatibility
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.': Usability
'The system shall be intuitive and self explanatory.': Usability
'A staff member shall have the ability to manage the progress of a part time student which includes modifying their sequence of classes and timeline of classes.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only authorized users are allowed to logon to the application.': Security
'The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn either offensive or defensive.': Functional Suitability
'Vendor will submit a credit validation record to be applied to the enterprise billing system.': Functional Suitability
'When both players have positioned their 5 ships on their defensive grids the product shall define the status of each player for the first turn.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes to a sequence of classes': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record different meeting types.': Functional Suitability
'The website should appeal to all Africans not only Nigerians.': Usability
'The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.': Functional Suitability
'The message board shall contain the 5 most recently posted messages on the league page. The messages will contain up to the first 150 characters of the message.': Usability
'The Disputes System shall provide view access capability for authorized users of the application.': Functional Suitability
'If the shot was marked as a miss the product shall change the status of the defensive player to offensive': Functional Suitability
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability
'The product will notify employees of meeting invitations.': Functional Suitability
'An anonymous survey will show that 70% of customers are comfortable purchasing streaming movies after 2 weeks using the website.': Usability
'A Program of Study shall consist of a program name and listing of required classes (both clinical and non-clinical) that must be completed.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.': Usability
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual cohorts which will include the students enlisted the Program of study sequence of classes cohort progress through the program and timeline of completion.': Functional Suitability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the offensive grid of the offensive player.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall maintain a list of players.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be able to send meeting notifications via different kinds of end-user specified methods.': Functional Suitability
'The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.': Functional Suitability
'New System version releases shall be released at the beginning of each NFL season.': Maintainability
'The estimator shall search for available recycled parts using damaged vehicle parts information.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.': Usability
'All authorized users once authenticated must be able to logon to the Disputes System': Security
'Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.': Security
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional Suitability
'Only registered realtors shall be able to access the system.': Security
'The system shall provide a history report of changes made to the Activity or Event data': Functional Suitability
'Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.': Reliability
'The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.': Security
'The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the number of available recycled parts from the original search results.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Usability
The system must be available for use between 7:00AM and 11:59PM all days of the year.': Reliability
'The product must be able to interface with various database management systems. The product shall communicate successfully with the database management system on 100% of all transactions.': Compatibility
'System will allow customers to pay for a streaming movie with a pre-paid card.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall have an intuitive user interface.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall display the grids within a circle as a view from a periscope.': Usability
'The product shall be easy to use by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. 95% of Adjusters and Collision Estimators shall find the product easy to use.': Usability
'The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.': Compatibility
'The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.': Compatibility
'The user shall be able to get driving directions to a selected property': Functional Suitability
'The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day 365 days per year': Reliability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Information Database. The Cardmember Information Database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember. All cardmember detail information must be obtained from the Cardmember Information Database.': Compatibility

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall be used within the specifications defined by the computers used by the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.': Reliability
'The system shall display the local and exercise time in separate clocks': Functional Suitability
'The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.': Compatibility
'The Disputes application shall ensure that only users with the appropriate access level are allowed to initiate dispute requests.': Security
'The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.': Usability
'Product installations and upgrades shall be handled by the middleware technology team within established launch time frames.': Compatibility
'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Compatibility
'The System shall allow generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents on demand.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall increase productivity of Collision Estimators. 80% of the Collision Estimators shall agree their productivity has increase within 1 month of using the product.': Usability
'The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.': Compatibility
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “pay as you go” user in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall notify customers of changes to its information policy.': Security
'The product shall record meeting entries.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid': Functional Suitability
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall indicate the type of ship sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall be able to cancel a clinical lab section only if there are no students registered for that clinical lab section.': Functional Suitability
'Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.': Security
'The system shall provide charts for the Activity or Event actual versus assumed time.': Functional Suitability
'The WCS system shall use appropriate nomenclature and terminology as defined by the Corporate Community Grants organization. All interfaces and reports will undergo usability tests by CCR users.': Usability
'The product shall be easy for a realtor to learn.': Usability

'The product shall provide Multi-threading and Load Balancing.The product shall provide multi-threading technology as well as load balancing to overcome data load spikes and traffic.': Performance Efficiency
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall offer the ability to pause and resume the refresh of data.'

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Total lead cycle time must be completed in 5 minutes for 90% of lead volume between the business hours of 8AM CST to 8PM CST; then 3 minutes for 99% of lead volume during off business hours.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
